mapper.sql: id, file_name, real_name, file_path, file_type, create_date
mapper.insert: insert into upload_file (id, file_name, real_name, file_path, file_type, create_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update upload_file set file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
